1549860.name: DOLYA'
1549860.description:
— When the Grand Writ shatters, Who will sever the Unbound Skazka?

The Skazka does not end.

✦ DESCRIPTION ✦

DOLYA' is an atmospheric fantasy 2D adventure with elements of RPG, puzzles, and a classic combat system. This is a story where the Fairy Tale does not end.

Close your eyes, draw constellations, and stretch the Threads of Fate. Solve mysteries and secrets with the power granted to you by the Ink Star. Fight the Impostors, who bear no names, and those who bear the names of Villains.

Step into CZUDH' - a whimsical world ruled by the Grand Writ, an unshakable reality, Fate stretched in threads between the stars, and True Names inscribed with cold ink right into the soul. A world into which She appeared.

The one who has no name, and therefore no rules. Dangerous, Treacherous, and beautiful. 

Skazka (The Fairy Tale). 

With a single wish, she can rewrite the whole world.

By the will of the Skazka, the very Star of Fate was erased from the sky — its Name torn from the Canon, and its place in the sky taken by thousands of fragments. Now reality is cracking, and in its place, a new, unknown story is being written.

Your role is not to save the world.

Your role is to save Fate.

To find that Name that was erased from reality.

The Skazka does not end.

✦ FEATURES ✦

  • Constellations and Threads of Fate — Draw constellations by connecting stars. Use them in battle, when solving puzzles, and for interacting with the world. Customize templates or improvise. Look for rare stars with unique effects. The template system and editor will allow you to customize your arsenal.

  • Gaze into Nejav' — Close your eyes to see the world beyond reality. Find hidden paths, read forgotten memories, and sense the approach of that which erases names.

  • Tactical Encounters — Fight the Impostors (nameless creations of the Fairy Tale) and those who bear Villainous Names. Combine weapons, constellations, and knowledge of enemy weaknesses. Pretty words are not enough — only cold calculation.

  • Puzzles of Rewritten Fate — After the disappearance of Fate, the laws of the world have malfunctioned. Use Constellations and Threads of Fate to change the very essence of objects and mechanisms, opening new paths and finding non-standard solutions.

  • World of String and Quill — Immerse yourself in the original soundtrack where cosmic ambient gives way to orchestral grandeur and techno-mysticism. The aesthetics, inspired by old Russian tales and Slavic symbolism, take on a new, philosophical form.

  • And the Fairy Tale does not end.

    ✦ FANTASY WORLD ✦

    Chud' is a world resting on three truths: the Unified Canon (the unchronicle of existence), the Threads of Fate (stretched between the stars and predestining what will happen to everyone), and True Names (keys to the very essence and role in the Plot).

    This fragile order was shattered by the appearance of the Skazka — a will without a name, naive and omnipotent. Wishing to make the world "happier," it erased the very Star of Fate from the sky. Now the Canon is cracking, stars are going out, and on the outskirts of Yav' rages the Flaw — the pain that the Skazka so wished to erase, the evil that has gained a face.

    You are one of the Heroes created by Gryoza - the Star Demiurge, the Ink Star that grants names and is the sister of the Erased Fate. She wrote your plot with one great finale - to save Fate itself. And to put a full stop in the Skazka. Your journey is not a clichéd march against evil. It is a search for answers in a world where reality itself has become unreliable.

The Skazka does not end.

✦ HEROES OF THIS TALE✦

You are not alone in this broken world. Others, written by the desperate Gryoza, are also seeking their path:

  • Yelisey, the Ink Soldier - He is called to bear the pain of creation in place of his mistress. Will he, the perfect servant, find his own will?

  • Yaryl, the Poet of the Revolver - The one who escaped her prescribed death nine chapters ago. Now, slowly fading, she travels the edge between being and oblivion, saving that which is doomed to disappear.

  • Seraphyma, the Fateful Spark - The first hope that suffered defeat. Help her wander through the fragments of the distorted Fairy Tale, following the scent of lavender and lost hints of the past.

  • ..and many others. Each with their own mission, pain, and unique view of the catastrophe that has befallen the world.

✦ THE SKAZKA DOES NOT END✦
1549860.supported_languages:
英语, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
